summary:
### September 2025 Summary for scaffold-eth/se-2-challenges

- **Major Features and Improvements:**
  - The "Simple NFT Challenge" was rebranded to "Tokenization Challenge" with updates to documentation and images (PRs #367, #361).
  - A new challenge for zk voting was successfully created and merged (PR #365).
  - Hero images in the README were updated to enhance visual appeal (PRs #358, #357).

- **Bug Fixes:**
  - Removed bold styles from headings to improve rendering in SRE (PR #363).

- **Overall Themes:**
  - Focus on rebranding and enhancing existing challenges to improve clarity and user experience.
  - Visual updates to documentation to maintain consistency and appeal.

topIssues.title: Add Oracle challenge to ethereum.org oracles page
Rebrand Simple NFT Challenge as Tokenization Challenge
Request for additional information to complete new issue draft

topPRs.title: Simple nft example: testnet opensea -> metamask extension
